title: Pompeo endorses former State Department spokesperson Ortagus in Tennessee House race

sentence: The Titans have five other receivers under contract: Racey McMath, Josh Malone, Dez Fitzpatrick, Cody Hollister (futures contract) and Mason Kinsey (futures contract).
author: Ben Arthur
title: With Julio Jones released, what comes next for Tennessee Titans at wide receiver?

sentence: Dez Fitzpatrick, who spent most of 2021 on the practice squad after being cut from the initial 53-man roster, and Rashad Weaver, who suffered a season-ending leg injury in Week 3, had little to no impact after being picked in the fourth round.
author: Ben Arthur
title: What Tennessee Titans GM Jon Robinson expects from 2022 draft class, last year's rookies
